name: Saiko - The Revival
description: SAIKO is an ERC20 token that aims to build an advanced blockchain solution for protecting parties in crypto ecosystem agreements. $SAIKO will build a smart automated vesting system for airdrops/payements. The first version of the solution will focus mainly on twitter marketing providers (e.g. tweets), and will later be extended to general use. In addition, $SAIKO dapp will have staking and dao.
